metadata.title: CVE-2021-47610 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm: Fix null ptr access msm_ioctl_gem_submit()Fix the below null pointer dereference in msm_ioctl_gem_submit(): 26545.260705:   Call trace: 26545.263223:    kref_put+0x1c/0x60 26545.266452:    msm_ioctl_gem_submit+0x254/0x744 26545.270937:    drm_ioctl_kernel+0xa8/0x124 26545.274976:    drm_ioctl+0x21c/0x33c 26545.278478:    drm_compat_ioctl+0xdc/0xf0 26545.282428:    __arm64_compat_sys_ioctl+0xc8/0x100 26545.287169:    el0_svc_common+0xf8/0x250 26545.291025:    do_el0_svc_compat+0x28/0x54 26545.295066:    el0_svc_compat+0x10/0x1c 26545.298838:    el0_sync_compat_handler+0xa8/0xcc 26545.303403:    el0_sync_compat+0x188/0x1c0 26545.307445:   Code: d503201f d503201f 52800028 4b0803e8 (b8680008) 26545.318799:   Kernel panic - not syncing: Oops: Fatal exception

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1014-aws - 5.15.0-1014.18~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-azure - 5.15.0-1007.8~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gcp - 5.15.0-1006.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-gkeop - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1033-ibm - 5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-oracle - 5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1
No subscription required
